existing_features.title: Update ONLY the selected button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[2]/button[1] (the Landing page “Continue with Internet Identity” button) to use the exact same visual styling as the Weekly Mountain page primary button labeled “View Today's SweetSteps” (same Tailwind class styling for height, typography, rounding, background, hover, and text colors).

Remove the mountain icon from inside ONLY the selected button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[2]/button[1] so the button content renders as text-only (keep the existing button label/behavior unchanged).

new_feature_requests.summary: Restyle the specified button to exactly match the 'View today’s daily steps' button on the Weekly Mountain page, and remove the mountain icon inside that button (no other changes).

projectName: Match Landing ‘Continue with Internet Identity’ button styling to Weekly Mountain and remove icon inside button
